Package org.lgdcloudsim.statemanager

Class RandomHostStateGenerator

java.lang.Object
org.lgdcloudsim.statemanager.RandomHostStateGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
HostStateGenerator
public class RandomHostStateGenerator extends Object implements HostStateGenerator
A class to generate random host state. Note that the range of randomly generated numbers here is: [min,max]
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Anonymous

  • Constructor Details

    • RandomHostStateGenerator

      public RandomHostStateGenerator(int seed)
      Initialize a random host state generator. Note that if seed=-1, it means that each generation is random, and the results of each generation are different. Otherwise, the same random number seed is used to generate each time, and the result of each random generation is the same
      Parameters:
      seed - the seed of the random number generator

    • RandomHostStateGenerator

      public RandomHostStateGenerator(int seed, int minCpu, int maxCpu, int minRam, int maxRam, int minStorage, int maxStorage, int minBw, int maxBw)
      Initialize a random host state generator.
      Parameters:
      seed - the seed of the random number generator
      minCpu - the minimum amount of cpu that is available on the host
      maxCpu - the maximum amount of cpu that is available on the host
      minRam - the minimum amount of ram that is available on the host
      maxRam - the maximum amount of ram that is available on the host
      minStorage - the minimum amount of storage that is available on the host
      maxStorage - the maximum amount of storage that is available on the host
      minBw - the minimum amount of bw that is available on the host
      maxBw - the maximum amount of bw that is available on the host

  • Method Details

    • generateHostState

      public int[] generateHostState()
      Generate the random state of a host.
      Specified by:
      generateHostState in interface HostStateGenerator
      Returns:
      the state of the host.The state includes 4 integers: cpu, ram, storage and bw.
